context: 10. Accrued Liabilities Accrued liabilities at April 30, 2019 and 2018, respectively, consisted of the following (in thousands):

questions.37bb138e-95ca-477e-9274-401931ea966d: What is the amount of vacation and other compensation in 2019 and 2018 respectively?
questions.fb099e38-8b87-43dd-a28f-41b6996e87ac: What is the amount of incentive compensation in 2019 and 2018 respectively?
questions.5e67e832-44c4-4284-96d3-75b81cd1ac26: What is the amount of payroll taxes in 2019 and 2018 respectively?
questions.735a2fcf-f401-4636-8e75-43743beddad4: What is the average amount of payroll taxes for 2018 and 2019?
questions.9f979006-ce64-424c-8e63-2bc1c5278cf7: What is the difference in the total accrued liabilities between 2018 and 2019?
questions.e0dcea2e-6a17-4797-92f9-5ce248888622: In 2019, what is the percentage constitution of warranty reserve among the total accrued liabilities?
